If given the option, many people would choose to live with a tarantula rather than a squatter. This story may or may not be about one of those people. However, things did get pretty wild after a turn of events.

A Hennepin County Board candidate was arrested after an alleged "squatter" accused her of throwing a tarantula at her.

Marisa Simonetti claims she is the only "Conservative" candidate but she may be confusing "conservative" with "unhinged." Unclear at this point. However, she alleges she allowed a woman to sublease a room in the reside
title: County candidate throws a tarantula at an alleged squatter, THEN things get super weird
